group_1.narration: Huh...?@Is this...school...?
...No, it can't be...@I'm sure I had fallen asleep...
Weeell...in times like this, pinch your cheek...
...It doesn't hurt at all.@So...a dream...?
Ah, there's...
There I am...
I can hardly believe how joyful I look...
That must be me from over a year ago,@before I became a Magical Girl...
...Ahhh, I see.
This is a dream of the time I was in love...
I had found it strange that I was dreaming of@school, but...
I'm sure it's because I discussed love with Hime@and the others.
Thus, I'm dreaming of that time...

group_1.textLeft: ...And, do you know what Hiko said next?

group_1.textRight: I've never really talked to a boy before, so...@...it's hard for me to guess...

group_1.textLeft: He said he was over the moon that we could@see the stars from the same eyes...!
[chara:102801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Isn't that totally crazy? I'm never gonna need to@wish upon some stars again!

group_1.textRight: I...don't know how to respond to that...
*Giggle* The two of you are so lovey-dovey♪

group_1.textLeft: Even if we talk inside my head,@it doesn't change our relationship★
Soooo, be honest with me, any of you ever@fallen in love?
Like you, Shigurin, don't you have anybody@you got your eyes on?

group_1.textRight: ...Even if I did, I wouldn't tell you.@You'd just make fun of me.

group_1.textLeft: Waaah, you're gonna make me cry.
That's totally not true. This cutie just wants to@talk about love...
Welp, not like I can force it out of you.
What about you, Hagurin?

group_1.textRight: M-me neither... I've never really been in love@before...

group_1.textLeft: Oooh!

group_1.textRight: I got a love letter for the first time in my life...

group_1.textLeft: Say whaaa! That's awesome!
That's Hagumun for you...

group_1.textRight: I-it's just from a kindergartener in@my neighborhood, though...

group_1.textLeft: Charm that goes beyond age...@That's Hagumun for you...
Love letters written in letters they just learned...@That's super adorbs!
Maybe 15 years from now, both of you will still@remember each other and end up together.
'Kay, now it's Sasha's turn—
[chara:102801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh?!

group_1.textRight: Oh dear, how strange. Are these tears...?

group_1.textLeft: A-are you okay...?
Is that a sensitive subject for you...?

group_1.textRight: D-don't worry, I'm quite alright♪@I truly don't know what's going on...

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm sorry, Sasha, that was kinda@inconsiderate of me...
I can smile and talk about love now, but...
If I hadn't met Sasha and bounced back...
I guess I would've cried just listening to@my friends talking about their love lives.
I thought I knew what it was like to be a@victim of tragic love...
To forget how I used to be and hurt Sasha...@That's the worst...
I ought to reflect...waahh...

group_1.narration: We discussed love,@thus I recalled the time I was in love@and dreamt about it.
If that's the case,@then it should be time for him to appear...
My first love, that teacher...

group_1.textRight: How long are you going to stay at school?@Go home before the sun goes down.

group_1.narration: ...He's here!
What... Shigure...?@Why...?

group_1.textLeft: I-I'm sorry...!@But I was just about to leave...

group_1.textRight: Ahhh, I see. I'm sorry about that...
I'm sure you have plenty of homework to do,@so don't take any detours on your way home.

group_1.textLeft: Y-yes...!
(The math homework you assigned accounts for@most of it...)
(But...I can't say that to him...)

group_1.narration: Not only Shigure, but Hime and Hagumu, too...?
There's odd things happening here,@but I still remember the conversation we had.
Over a year ago,@right after club activities,@I had a casual conversation with him,@who was both my club advisor and math teacher.
The problem is that he now appears as@Hime and the others, but...
...that's probably as a result of my wish.
I suppose that's why I cannot even picture him@in my dreams anymore.
Even though he was my first love...
